title: need 1 orange essence to buy skin
body: how  i can get 1 orange essence to unlock pug maw skin ?  I have 674  bit need 675 pls RIOT send me 1  essenc its my favorit skin  at kog

replies.body: We like to help when we can, but essence is not something we currently gift out.  Your best bet is to keep playing normally to grab more.  Good luck!
If they do this, they might request you to draw something for them to earn it, similar to RP art.
